docs.snippet: For years, the government has tried to decapitate drug cartels by capturing or killing their leaders. But the organizations are often replaced by smaller, even more vicious groups....
docs.lead_paragraph: For years, the government has tried to decapitate drug cartels by capturing or killing their leaders. But the organizations are often replaced by smaller, even more vicious groups.
docs.abstract: Capture of drug kingpins in Mexico has only escalated violence, as rival factions of fractured cartels battle over control; government continues to flounder in finding an effective strategy for curbing bloody mayhem.

headline.main: As Drug Kingpins Fall in Mexico, Cartels Fracture and Violence Surges
headline.print_headline: Cartels Fracture in Mexico as Drug Kingpins Fall, and Violence Surges

docs.snippet: There are strong opinions about whether to shoot video vertically or horizontally. Holding your phone the “wrong way” provokes both professional and amateur photographers....
docs.lead_paragraph: There are strong opinions about whether to shoot video vertically or horizontally. Holding your phone the “wrong way” provokes both professional and amateur photographers.
docs.abstract: Farhad Manjoo State of the Art column observes that while videos made by holding a smartphone vertically are looked down upon by many as amateurish, video consumers seem to prefer them; contends vertical video actually works better given the dimensions of a smartphone or tablet screen and tendency of users to hold the devices vertically.

headline.main: Vertical Video on the Small Screen? Not a Crime
headline.print_headline: Vertical Video? It Fits the Screen

docs.snippet: Reward money totaling $10,000 has been offered in the search for a man wanted in a crime spree that included a killing and kidnapping as police in California on Thursday scoured mountain ranges and high desert for the suspect....
docs.lead_paragraph: Reward money totaling $10,000 has been offered in the search for a man wanted in a crime spree that included a killing and kidnapping as police in California on Thursday scoured mountain ranges and high desert for the suspect.

headline.main: $10,000 in Rewards Offered as California Police Hunt Fugitive Murder Suspect
headline.print_headline: $10,000 in Rewards Offered as California Police Hunt Fugitive Murder Suspect

docs.snippet: New Orleans is approaching the 10th anniversary of Hurricane Katrina, a mammoth storm that caused the levees protecting the city to break and submerge vast swaths of the Crescent City. In the run-up to the anniversary, The Associated Press sat dow...
docs.lead_paragraph: New Orleans is approaching the 10th anniversary of Hurricane Katrina, a mammoth storm that caused the levees protecting the city to break and submerge vast swaths of the Crescent City. In the run-up to the anniversary, The Associated Press sat down with New Orleans Mayor Mitch Landrieu, elected in 2010 and re-elected in 2014, to discuss the storm, the anniversary and the city's future.

headline.main: AP Interview: New Orleans Mayor Praises Post-Katrina Change
headline.print_headline: AP Interview: New Orleans Mayor Praises Post-Katrina Change

docs.snippet: The burning newspapers placed outside the home of five asylum seekers in Brandenburg an der Havel, a small town near Berlin, prompted a swift response. Germany's foreign minister called the incident last month, in which nobody was injured, a "cowa...
docs.lead_paragraph: The burning newspapers placed outside the home of five asylum seekers in Brandenburg an der Havel, a small town near Berlin, prompted a swift response. Germany's foreign minister called the incident last month, in which nobody was injured, a "cowardly act of arson."

headline.main: Attacks on Refugees Tempered by Strong Support in Germany
headline.print_headline: Attacks on Refugees Tempered by Strong Support in Germany

docs.snippet: The Methodist choir director asked me to infuse my performance with the “Demon of Lust.” Fortunately, I knew a thing or two about possession....
docs.abstract: The Methodist choir director asked me to infuse my performance with the “Demon of Lust.” Fortunately, I knew a thing or two about possession.

headline.main: On Whoredom, Demonic Possession and Penitence
